functions.name: scheduler_bind_address
functions.description: Checks bind address configuration for scheduler.

functions.name: scheduler_pod_spec_file_permissions
functions.description: Checks pod spec file permissions for scheduler.

functions.name: scheduler_pod_spec_file_ownership
functions.description: Checks pod spec file ownership for scheduler.

functions.name: scheduler_conf_file_permissions
functions.description: Checks config file permissions for scheduler.

functions.name: scheduler_conf_file_ownership
functions.description: Checks config file ownership for scheduler.

functions.name: scheduler_bind_address_localhost_check
functions.description: Checks if bind address is set to localhost for scheduler.

notes: All functions are based on Kubernetes SCHEDULER API.
Ensure proper RBAC permissions are configured.
SCHEDULER is a Kubernetes scheduler component.
Configuration, security, monitoring, scheduler, and compliance are key aspects.
Implement appropriate retry logic for API calls.
Use Kubernetes client libraries for API interactions.
